title: Alpha Portal Frontend
description: React-based frontend application for managing projects, clients, and users. Connects to a RESTful backend API and includes responsive UI components built with HTML, CSS, and React.

title: Alpha Portal Backend API
description: ASP.NET Core Web API that handles project and client management operations. Uses Entity Framework Core with SQL Server for data persistence and JWT authentication for security.

title: Ventixe Frontend
description: ASP.NET Core MVC application for the Ventixe event platform. Combines server-side rendering with client-side JavaScript and communicates with backend services through REST APIs and gRPC.

title: Ventixe Events Backend
description: Microservice built with ASP.NET Core Web API for handling event operations on the Ventixe platform. Uses Entity Framework Core for data access and is deployed on Azure.

title: Ventixe Image Service Backend
description: Dedicated microservice for image upload and management operations. Built with ASP.NET Core Web API and integrates with Azure storage services for file handling.

title: My Portfolio
description: Personal portfolio website built with React and TypeScript. Uses Tailwind CSS for styling and showcases development projects and technical skills.

title: Hederlige Harrys
description: Group project website for a fictional used car dealership. Built with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and vanilla JavaScript as a collaborative web development exercise.

title: Movie Booking App
description: React application for movie ticket booking with seat selection functionality. Implements state management for booking flow and responsive design for mobile and desktop use.

title: Shotgun Game
description: Windows desktop game implementing Shotgun game mechanics with computer opponent. Built using C# and WinForms with game logic and UI event handling.

title: Address Form
description: Desktop application for contact management with CRUD operations. Uses WinForms for the interface and SQL Server for data storage and retrieval.

title: Ad Form
description: Windows Forms application for managing advertisement listings. Implements database operations with SQL Server and form-based data entry and validation.

title: Bowling Game
description: Console application that simulates bowling game scoring and member registration system. Developed for an Object-Oriented Analysis and Design course, demonstrating design patterns and OOP principles.

title: Bakery Shop
description: Static website for a bakery business built with HTML and CSS. Created as a first web development project for learning fundamental web technologies and layout techniques.
